annotations:
GOOD DAY,
PLEASE PROPOSE OUR DIRECT
MV XI LONG 19 64K DWT/2014   OPEN DJEN DJEN, ALGERIA 24-27 AUG., 2024 IAGW. WP.
-RIGHTSHIP APPROVAL, TCT/PERIOD OK.
W.W TRADING INCLUDING RED SEA, GOA, BLACK SEA, W. AFRICA HRA, USA, CANADA, EUROPE.
-GRAIN CLEAN, 2*25MT COILS AND DECK CARGO OK
WINDMILL BLADE LOADING OK.
BOD ABT 600/95MT.
TRY ANY INCL BOP END DEC/END FEB 2025
MV  XI LONG 19
TYPE OF VESSEL:                 BULK CARRIER
DWAT (SUMMER/WINTER):        63250 MT / 61529 MT  DRAFT (SUMMER/WINTER):       13.30 M / 13.023 M
FLAG / PORT OF REGISTRY:      MARSHALL ISLANDS / MAJURO  BUILT (MONTH/YEAR)/YARD:     JAN 2014 / YANGZHOU DAYANG - CHINA
CLASSIFICATION: RINA (REGISTRO ITALIANE NAVALE)
L.O.A. / L.B.P.:                     199.99 M / 193.74 M  BEAM:                            32.26 M   MOULDED DEPTH:                18.50 M   T.P.C. ON SSW:                     62.1 T/CM
INTERNAT. GT/NT:                 35812 / 21224   SUEZ CANAL GT/NT:               36898.97 / 33344.56    PANAMA CANAL NT:               29651
DWT / DRAFT - TROPICAL          64971 / 13.577   DWT /DRAFT û FRESH WATER      64933 / 13.879
NUMBER OF HOLDS / HATCHES: - HOLD VENTILATION: 5 / 5 - NATURAL
HOLDS              GRAIN CADECK CARGO IS ALLOWED
Uniform load of hatch cover              2.2 MT/M2;     Uniform load of upper deck (No.1 CH)     4.5 MT/M2;    Uniform load of upper deck (No.2~5 CH)   5.0 MT/M2
CRANES: 4 X ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC SWL 36MT CRANES BSS HOOK/28MT BSS GRAB OPERATION X MAX OUTREACH No.1-4: 29M MAX
GRABS:4 x REMOTE CONTROL GRABS/DEADWEIGHT: 10MT/ADJUSTABLE CAPACITY: 7 TO 15 M3. MAXIMUM CARGO DENSITY 2.5 T/M3.
FULL SPEED AND CONSUMPTION(WOG):
LADEN:ABOUT 13.00 KNOTS ON ABT 27.00 MT LSFO 380CST + ABOUT 0.10 MT LSMGO
BALLAST:ABOUT 13.50 KNOTS ON ABT 25.00 MT LSFO 380CST + ABOUT 0.10 MT LSMGO
IN PORT CONSUMPTION:
IDLE            ABOUT 2.50 MT LSFO + 0.10 MT LSMGO
WORKING:      ABOUT 4.50 MT LSFO + 0.10 MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED AND CONSUMPTION(GUARANTEE):
LADEN:ABOUT 12.00 KNOTS ON ABT 22.00 MT LSFO 380CST + ABOUT 0.10 MT LSMGO
BALLAST: ABOUT 12.50 KNOTS ON ABT 21.00 MT LSFO 380CST + ABOUT 0.10 MT LSMGO
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
PLEASED TO HEAR
BEST REGARDS
GARY CAMPBELL
CAMERI MARITIME INC.
TEL: +1-514-994-5293
SKYPE: GARYC2568
Unsubscribe
